00018 QAviWriter::QAviWriter(const QString& fileName, const QSize& size, unsigned int fps, const QString& codec)
00019 : QObject(),
00020 d_file_name(fileName),
00021 d_audio_file_name(""),
00022 d_size(size),
00023 d_fps(fps),
00024 d_frame_count(0),
00025 d_bit_rate(0),
00026 gwavi(NULL)
00027 {
00028     setCodec(codec);
00029 }
00030 
00037 bool QAviWriter::open()
00038 {
00039     gwavi = gwavi_open(d_file_name.toUtf8().constData(), (unsigned int)d_size.width(), (unsigned int)d_size.height(),
00040             d_codec.toLatin1().constData(), d_fps, ((!d_audio_file_name.isEmpty() && parseAudioFileFormat()) ? &d_audio_format : NULL));
00041 
00042     return (gwavi != NULL);
00043 }
00044 
00051 bool QAviWriter::close()
00052 {
00053     if (!d_audio_file_name.isEmpty())
00054         addAudioFile(d_audio_file_name);
00055 
00056     int error = gwavi_close(gwavi);
00057     if (!error)
00058         gwavi = NULL;
00059 
00060     return (error == 0);
00061 }

00064 void QAviWriter::setAudioFileName(const QString& audioFileName)
00065 {
00066     d_audio_file_name = audioFileName;
00067 }
00068 
00069 bool QAviWriter::parseAudioFileFormat()
00070 {
00071     std::ifstream file(d_audio_file_name.toUtf8().constData(), std::ifstream::in | std::ifstream::binary);
00072     if (!file.is_open()){
00073         printf("Error opening the input audio file!\n");
00074         return false;
00075     }
00076 
00077     file.seekg(20, ios::beg);
00078     short format;
00079     file.read((char*)&format, sizeof(short)); // read the file format. This should be 1 for PCM
00080     if (format != 1){
00081         printf("The input audio file is not a PCM type file!\n");
00082         file.close();
00083         return false;
00084     }
00085 
00086     short channels;
00087     file.read((char*)&channels, sizeof(short));// read the number of channels (1 or 2)
00088 
00089     d_audio_format.channels = (unsigned int)channels;
00090     //printf("Audio channels: %d\n", channels);
00091 
00092     int sampleRate;
00093     file.read((char*)&sampleRate, sizeof(int));
00094     d_audio_format.samples_per_second = (unsigned int)sampleRate;
00095     //printf("Audio sample rate: %d\n", sampleRate);
00096 
00097     file.read((char*)&d_bit_rate, sizeof(unsigned int));
00098     //printf("Audio bit rate: %d\n", d_bit_rate);
00099 
00100     short blockAlign;
00101     file.read((char*)&blockAlign, sizeof(short));
00102 
00103     short bitsPerSample;
00104     file.read((char*)&bitsPerSample, sizeof(short));
00105     d_audio_format.bits = (unsigned int)bitsPerSample;
00106     //printf("Audio bits per sample: %d\n", bitsPerSample);
00107 
00108     file.close();
00109     return true;
00110 }
00111 
00120 bool QAviWriter::setSize(const QSize& size)
00121 {
00122     if (d_size == size)
00123         return false;
00124 
00125     int error = gwavi_set_size(gwavi, (unsigned int)size.width(), (unsigned int)size.height());
00126     if (!error)
00127         d_size = size;
00128 
00129     return (error == 0);
00130 }
00131 
00133 bool QAviWriter::setCodec(const QString& codec)
00134 {
00135     if (d_codec == codec)
00136         return false;
00137 
00138     if (isCodecSupported(codec)){
00139         d_codec = codec;
00140         return true;
00141     }
00142 
00143     return false;
00144 }
00145 
00146 bool QAviWriter::isCodecSupported(const QString& codec)
00147 {
00148     return (check_fourcc(codec.toLatin1().constData()) == 0);
00149 }
00150 
00152 bool QAviWriter::addFrame(QImage img, const char* format, int quality)
00153 {
00154     if (!gwavi)
00155         return false;
00156 
00157     QByteArray ba;
00158     QBuffer buffer(&ba);
00159     buffer.open(QIODevice::WriteOnly);
00160     img.save(&buffer, format, quality);
00161 
00162     int error = gwavi_add_frame(gwavi, (unsigned char *)ba.data(), (size_t)ba.size());
00163     if (!error)
00164         ++d_frame_count;
00165 
00166     return (error == 0);
00167 }
00168 
00170 bool QAviWriter::addFrame(QPixmap pix, const char* format, int quality)
00171 {
00172     if (!gwavi)
00173         return false;
00174 
00175     QByteArray ba;
00176     QBuffer buffer(&ba);
00177     buffer.open(QIODevice::WriteOnly);
00178     pix.save(&buffer, format, quality);
00179 
00180     int error = gwavi_add_frame(gwavi, (unsigned char *)ba.data(), (size_t)ba.size());
00181     if (!error)
00182         ++d_frame_count;
00183 
00184     return (error == 0);
00185 }

00188 bool QAviWriter::addFrame(unsigned char* buffer, size_t length)
00189 {
00190     if (!gwavi)
00191         return false;
00192 
00193     int error = gwavi_add_frame(gwavi, buffer, length);
00194     if (!error)
00195         ++d_frame_count;
00196 
00197     return (error == 0);
00198 }

00200 bool QAviWriter::addAudioFile(const QString& fileName)
00201 {
00202     if (!gwavi || fileName.isEmpty())
00203         return false;
00204 
00205     QFile file(fileName);
00206     if (!file.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly))
00207         return false;
00208 
00209     QByteArray ba = file.readAll();
00210     return (gwavi_add_audio(gwavi, (unsigned char *)ba.data(), (size_t)ba.size()) == 0);
00211 }

00217 unsigned int QAviWriter::audioChannelCount()
00218 {
00219     return d_audio_file_name.isEmpty() ? 0 : d_audio_format.channels;
00220 }
00221 
00222 unsigned int QAviWriter::audioSampleRate()
00223 {
00224     return d_audio_file_name.isEmpty() ? 0 : d_audio_format.samples_per_second;
00225 }
00226 
00227 unsigned int QAviWriter::audioBitsPerSample()
00228 {
00229     return d_audio_file_name.isEmpty() ? 0 : d_audio_format.bits;
00230 }

00232 QList<QByteArray> QAviWriter::supportedAudioFormats()
00233 {
00234     QList<QByteArray> lst;
00235     lst.append(QByteArray("WAV", 3));
00236     return lst;
00237 }
00238 
00239 QList<QByteArray> QAviWriter::supportedVideoFormats()
00240 {
00241     QList<QByteArray> lst;
00242     lst.append(QByteArray("AVI", 3));
00243     return lst;
00244 }

00246 QAviWriter::~QAviWriter()
00247 {
00248     if (gwavi)
00249         close();
00250 }
